mapper.select: SELECT i.itemname as item_itemname, i.itemplace as item_place, i.estart as item_estart, i.efin as item_efin, ol.orderlistid, ol.ordercnt as orderlist_ordercnt, i.itemplace as item_place ,ol.orderdate as orderlist_orderdate, ol.candate as orderlist_candate FROM orderlist ol INNER JOIN item i ON ol.itemid = i.itemid
